label: ID Number
value_labels: numeric

label: Religious vs. Geographic Change
value_labels: 1. Religious Change 2. Demographic Change

label: The data discussed in this article was gathered ____.
value_labels: 1. by a telephone interview company 2. by the U.S. Census Bureau 3. in lab studies across the country

label: The national trend discussed in this article suggests that individuals are _____ over time.
value_labels: 1. becoming more religious 2. becoming less religious 3. not changing in regards to their religious beliefs

label: By 2042, researchers predict that within the United States ____.
value_labels: 1. religious people will no longer be in the majority 2. religious people will no longer be in the minority 3. religious people will return to being in the majority

label: The trends discussed in this article are expected to be driven by ____.
value_labels: 1. millennials 2. baby boomers 3. members of the greatest generation

label: These trends are expected to continue regardless of culture.
value_labels: 1. True 2. False

label: I would be completely comfortable in a social setting (such as a dance club or bar) where there were very few people from my religion.
value_labels: 1. Strongly Agree 2. Agree 3. Neutral 4. Disagree 5. Strongly Disagree

label: I would be completely comfortable dating someone of a different religion (if I was single).
value_labels: 1. Strongly Agree 2. Agree 3. Neutral 4. Disagree 5. Strongly Disagree

label: It would bother me if my child married someone from a different religious background.
value_labels: 1. Strongly Agree 2. Agree 3. Neutral 4. Disagree 5. Strongly Disagree

label: I would prefer to live in a neighborhood with people of my same religion.
value_labels: 1. Strongly Agree 2. Agree 3. Neutral 4. Disagree 5. Strongly Disagree

label: If I were living with others in a house or an apartment, I would be more comfortable if my roommates were from my same religious background.
value_labels: 1. Strongly Agree 2. Agree 3. Neutral 4. Disagree 5. Strongly Disagree

label: I would rather work alongside people of my same religion.
value_labels: 1. Strongly Agree 2. Agree 3. Neutral 4. Disagree 5. Strongly Disagree

label: What is your gender?
value_labels: 1. Female 2. Male 3. Other

label: What is your age?
value_labels: numeric

label: What is the zip code for the location in which you have spent the largest portion of your life?
value_labels: numeric

label: Please indicate were you would fall on the Liberal/Conservative spectrum?
value_labels: 1. Very Liberal 11. Very Conservative

label: Please indicate were you would fall on the Left/Right spectrum?
value_labels: 1. Very Left 11. Very Right

label: Do you believe in God?
value_labels: 1. No 2. Yes

label: In regards to your stated belief or unbelief in God, how certain are you?
value_labels: 1. Very Uncertain 2. Uncertain 3. Moderately Uncertain 4. Neutral 5. Moderately Certain 6. Certain 7. Very Certain

label: How important is religion in your daily life?
value_labels: 1. Irrelevant 2. Very Unimportant 3. Unimportant 4. Important 5. Very important 6. Highest Importance

label: Aside from weddings and funerals, how often do you attend religious services?
value_labels: 1. Never 2. Seldom 3. A few times a year 4. Once or twice a year 5. Once a week 6. More than once a week

label: Outside of attending religious services, how often do you pray?
value_labels: 1. Never 2. A few times a month 3. Once a week 4. A few times a week 5. Seldom 6. Once a day 7. Multiple times a day

label: Please circle your religious affiliation.
value_labels: 1. Agnostic 2. Atheist 3. Buddhist 4. Chinese traditional 5. Christian 6. Christian (specifically Catholic) 7. Christian (specifically Protestant) 8. Hindu 9. Muslim 10. No religion 11. Sikh 12. Other

label: There is a heaven where people who have led good lives are eternally rewarded.
value_labels: 1. I strongly disagree 2. I disagree 3. I don't know 4. I agree 5. I strongly agree

label: There is a hell where people who have led bad lives and die without being sorry are eternally punished.
value_labels: 1. I strongly disagree 2. I disagree 3. I don't know 4. I agree 5. I strongly agree

label: Religious miracles occur.
value_labels: 1. I strongly disagree 2. I disagree 3. I don't know 4. I agree 5. I strongly agree

label: Angels and demons are active in the world.
value_labels: 1. I strongly disagree 2. I disagree 3. I don't know 4. I agree 5. I strongly agree

label: There is a life after death.
value_labels: 1. I strongly disagree 2. I disagree 3. I don't know 4. I agree 5. I strongly agree

label: People have an immaterial soul, a part of themselves that is beyond their merely physiological and physical properties.
value_labels: 1. I strongly disagree 2. I disagree 3. I don't know 4. I agree 5. I strongly agree

label: Did you participated in that previous study?
value_labels: 1. No 2. Yes
